Name: S by Ray Signorello Cabernet Sauvignon
Mocenni Particella 91
Wine Description: Covering 1,000 hectares within the enchanting province of Siena, nestled in the historic and captivating city of Tuscany, Bindi Sergardi's vineyards have been crafting exceptional wines for centuries. With a legacy dating back to 1349 and spanning 23 generations, this family-operated winery is dedicated to encapsulating its rich heritage in each and every sip of its wines. Celebrated as ‘a great super Tuscan’, Bindi Sergardi’s Mocenni Particella 91 is a hugely popular red wine among the Vivino community. One member comments, “I had doubts if the high Vivino rating can be justified. Certainly, it can.” Join hundreds of Vivino customers and try Bindi Sergardi Mocenni Particella 91 today. With a taste as unique as its hue, this brick red sauvignon boasts a bouquet of black currant, blackberry, blueberries, oak, tobacco and chocolate. Full bodied, with medium maturing tannins and balanced acidity, you’ll find the Bindi Sergardi Mocenni Particella 91 has a long, pleasant aftertaste. Perfectly pairs with beef, lamb, veal, poultry and cured meats, making it essential to have waiting in the wings for any dinner party. Bindi Sergardi Mocenni Particella 91 2016 vintage rates better than any other year for this wine, so it's a great starting point to sample this variety.

Name: Eileen Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has riper styling, bigger and plump. Blood orange dominant fruit. Great spice.

Name: White Label Carema
Wine Description: Intense garnet red, limpid and dense. In Nose Spicy, fruity notes. Fine hints of dried flowers and rose petals.The Palate is warm, tannic mouth feel. Well-integrated spicy notes.

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Rabajà
Wine Description: It has considerable structure, elegance and great capacity for evolution.

Name: Illahe Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Light reddish-purple color in the glass. Aromas of oak-kissed black cherries. Bright and juicy with a core of earth-toned black cherries and raspberries with an underpinning of oak, tutti-fruity, and spice. Elegant with an uplifting finish.

Name: Black Label
Wine Description: Very ripe and pleasing fruit sensations fill your mouth while the spice and tannins are just enough to keep everything in play and help define this wine.

Name: Morro View Vineyard Grenache
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Vegetarian, Poultry, Spicy food

Name: Little Feet Merlot
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Vegetarian, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: This a simply round and delicious that tantalizes the palate with each sip. Soft tannins on an elegant and focused palate with a monstrous lengthy finish

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: It delivers aromas and flavors of ripe cherries, plum, tobacco, mineral and a herbal edge. Full-bodied with a velvety texture that shows nice structure and balance, ending with a long, chewy finish

Name: Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This Pinot has a wonderful bouquet that fills the room. It is a concentrated Pinot with a strong perfume of blackberries and rose petals.

Name: Veliko Rdeče
Wine Description: Medium depth and garnet colour proudly showing its age. Nose is mature, gentle, rather subtle, fine and layered. Seamless. Nose of spices and blackcurrant gives a sense of Bordeaux grapes, coming from fresher, cooler climate. These are complemented with notes of truffles, dark chocolate and fine oak. Dry on the palate, with mature, supple tannins and silky texture.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Prestige
Wine Description: It is a very complex wine, comprising numerous types of grape. It presents aromas of ripe red and black fruit, spices (clover, pepper) and mushrooms, and, as it ages, of truffles and old leather.

Name: Feather Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Produced by acclaimed Napa Valley vintner Randy Dunn, Feather might best be described as "an iron fist in a velvet glove." This incredibly complex wine offers an array of fresh berry aromas, complemented by spicy, dark cherry and dried currant flavors.

Name: Day One Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Carmel Mediterranean
Wine Description: Deep purplish hue and is characterized by the perfume of blackberry, spices, and black olives. Full-bodied and rich, with a long and balanced finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: This hearty red opens with aromas of wild cherry, black raspberry and chopped mint. The solid, monolithic palate offers dried cherry, star anise and coffee alongside velvety tannins

Name: Louise Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has dark cherry, stemmy, some green herb, lots of clove, a little orange zest, really beginning to drink well.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bursts with fruit expressions of plum. The floral and spice notes are equally impressive. A silky entry gives way to a plush and full mouthfeel.

Name: Gevrey-Chambertin
Wine Description: Very fresh, cool aromas of red and blue forest fruits with underbrush and soil nuances. The palate is detailed, racy and impressively intense. The flavours posses good volume on the linear and relatively powerful finish.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: Slight amber edge with deep ruby core. Forward and right at the peak of its drinking window, this full bodied wine is loaded with cherries and roasted herbs. Still a wee bit tannic.

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Rio Sordo
Wine Description: Elegant wines of medium body, silky tannins and long finish.

Name: Le Pich Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of black plum, blackberries, black cherry, lilacs and graphite. This full-bodied with rich and beautifully balanced with flavors fully ripened black fruit, floral notes, and melted chocolate and leading to an explosive long finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep purple-black in color, this Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon displays aromas of black currant, cassis and spice. This powerful, full bodied wine is packed with the rich flavors of ripe dark fruit. Tannins are silky and smooth, resulting in a seamless yet intense wine of structure and balance.

Name: Domaine Eden Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Inky dark red and blue-fleshed fruit, smoke, spices and licorice hit the palate as this exuberant, radiant Cabernet shows off its racy personality. There is more than enough plumpness but also enough density to drink well for a number of years.

Name: Lousas Parcela Seoane
Wine Description: A blend of Mencía and other local grapes from 60 year-old vines planted in broken slate, in a south-west facing parcela located in Amandi, sitting at 400 meters elevation. Grapes are foot-stomped and fermented with whole-clusters in a small open vat. Like the other Lousas wines, it is marked by extreme purity, lifted aromatics and delicious savouriness. It’s a shame there’s little of it, but that makes it all the more special.

Name: Paderewski Vineyard
Wine Description: Concentration, but not super rich, soft tannins but still some grip, great fresh acids but nothing searing or flabby, depth, depth, and more depth, they are as a whole wines that continue to evolve in the glass for days, every sip revealing something new, something that was hidden the previous sip.

Name: Bourgogne Hautes-Côtes de Beaune Les Paizets
Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: It is a dark ruby in color, rather flamboyant nose of intense dark cherry, toasted oak, milk chocolate, and smoke.It has rich red-black fruit with very dry, gritty tannins on the palate. This sucker needs some food.

Name: Rattlesnake Acres Petite Syrah
Wine Description: Aromatically - elegant yet intense aromas of white pepper and blueberry concentrate blackberry sweet nectar and purple flowers.

Name: Borobo
Wine Description: Color: Intense bright ruby red with deep purple shadows. Nose: very complex and elegant, red and black fruit, spices and tobacco. Mouth: attractive attack followed by a balanced and pleasant mid palate, with a long finish. Smooth and round tannins with some more spices and red fruit create a complex and harmonic ensemble.

Name: San Valentino Umbria Rosso
Wine Description: Impeccably balanced, this wine marries its juicy red and blue fruits with crushed flower petals, sun-warmed earth, baking spices, and cigar wrapper. Fresh yet caressing, this wine wraps on palate in a seamless grip and only lets it go after a long, lingering finish.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: With a rich, deep color, the perfume exhibits pepper, black raspberry jam, grenadine, garrigue, licorice and raspberry liqueur. The opulent, silky textured fruit coats your mouth and palate, ending in a long, peppery, sweet, pure, red cherry liqueur finish.

Name: Valsecchi Vineyard Zinfandel
Wine Description: Bursting with aromas of fresh mint, cocoa powder and Santa Rosa plum. This wine has a viscous and weighty entry. Beautifully balance with a long refreshing finish of integrated fruit, spice, oak, tannin and acid

Name: Knights Valley Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The Beringer winemaking team has worked the Knights Valley vineyards for two decades, watching the vineyards evolve and noting which blocks and rows are particularly unique. Using fruit from those prized blocks, Mark Beringer has crafted the Knights Valley Reserve Cabernet, which provides the purest and most layered expression of the unique terroir found in Knights Valley.

Name: Gigondas Les Racines
Wine Description: Ruby-red. Ripe dark berries and kirsch on the nose, with complicating notes of licorice and black tea. Rich, deep and powerful, with a distinctly ripe character to the dark fruit flavors. Fresher on the finish, which features chewy tannins and leaves smoke and licorice notes behind.

Name: Clos des Porrets Nuits-Saint-Georges 1er Cru
Wine Description: The nose is not reduced and displays really lovely of the vegetal, earth, floral and a touch of the sauvage on the fresh and cool fruit aromas that precede the round, pure and relatively supple flavors that possess a textured mouth feel and more complexity on the serious, frank and direct if not especially rustic finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This brilliant ruby colored wine has aromas of forest floor, cherry, clove and cola. Medium bodied and round in the mouth, pleasant flavors of soft red fruits, cola and vanilla are complimented by the fine tannin and fresh acidity. A luscious and supple balance of flavors, with a pure texture, that leads to a polished finish with a hint of earthy minerality.

Name: Estate Grown Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This intensely aromatic wine has layers of ripe red cherries, strawberry compote, dried cranberries, and lush raspberries. Fresh rose petals and violets are woven together with cinnamon sticks, cloves, and creamy vanilla.
